t t e r n b y y a r n c r e a t u r e supplies notes 160g/300yds 275m dk weight yarn fsc set up make a sl knot and place it on your hook chain 2 step 1a as if to begin a single_crochet insert hook into second chain from hook lion brand 24/7 cotton 100g/186yds 170m 100% yo and pull up a loop 2 loops on hook mercerized cotton in mint and white 1 ball each step 2a yo pull through one loop 1 chain created 2 loops on color a 100g/186yds 170m mint hook color b 60g/112yds 102m white step 3a as if to complete a single_crochet yo and pull through both loops on hook one fsc completed us g/6 4mm crochet hook or size required to obtain gauge for subsequent fsc scissors step 1b as if to begin a single_crochet insert hook under the chain created in tapestry needle the 2nd step of the previous fsc step 2a above yo and pull up a loop 2 loops on your hook gauge step 2b yo pull through one loop 1 chain created 2 loops on hook 13 sts 6 5 motifs x 13 row = 4 10cm in pattern after blocking step 3b as if to complete a single_crochet yo and pull through both loops on hook finished size repeat steps 1b-3b until the required amount of fsc are achieved 19 48cm x 15 38cm bdst double_crochet yo insert hook around stem of the double_crochet just made right to key left and front to back yo pull up a loop 3 times in the same fsc foundation single_crochet place yo pull through first 6 loops on hook yo pull through sl slip remaining 2 loops chain chain fpdc identify the st you will use in row below bring your hook to single_crochet single_crochet the front of your work yo insert hook front to back right to left yo yarn over around the back of the post of the identified st yo pull up a loop bdst bead stitch complete the double_crochet as usual yo pull through 2 loops yo pull double_crochet double_crochet through the final 2 loops beg beginning bpdc identify the st you will use in row below bring your hook to st sts stitch stitches the back of your work yo insert hook back to front right to left skip skip around the front of the post of the identified st yo pull up a loop treble_crochet treble_crochet
